website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive and basic racerback sports bra accommodates medium-level activity. Comfortable enough to wear around the house.
pros: Available in a variety of colors
Made of flexible fabric that’s easy to put on and take off
Bra stands up to many washes
Extremely comfortable to wear while working out or simply lounging around the house
cons: Meant for medium activity, isn’t the best for wicking moisture

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t think this sports bra would provide enough support, but I’m pleasantly surprised! It’s very comfortable and so far (3 runs) it has worked well for support. I am a 34D and have usually bought sports bras with clasps because they are typically higher impact. However, they are not as comfortable and the clasps inevitably start bending out of shape after repeated wears. I’m super excited that this style works and provides enough support because it is very lightweight and comfortable. I am however, using it in winter when I am wearing multiple layers. But I still think it will work well even in just a tank top. Recommended even for larger bra sizes!
customer_reviews.author: M. Swingler

customer_reviews.title: I wash them in the washing mashing and their good condition lasts long
customer_reviews.text: I have quite a few of these. Prefer a size smaller for a tighter fit, S instead of M. They stretch. I wash them in the washing mashing and their good condition lasts long. Supportive enough for my size. I have them mostly in black and white, because I don't like the color of the finishing threads all around the edges that differs from the color of the bras. For this reason I don't buy them in other colors. But the product is quality. Though I compare them with the ones I bought in the past - the fabric of the latest ones is thinner. But still love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: XL White Seamless Racerback Sport Bra
customer_reviews.text: Not particularly happy with this purchase. Purchased Champion non-removable pad bras at Target in the past and loved them. Description stated "Knit-in cups provide Moderate Support during walking and gym workouts". These have no padding or cups, just two layers of material. Arrived on time, other than no padding, as described. Love Amazon, but have come to the conclusion Amazon is not the place for me to buy clothes.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Showing your girls
customer_reviews.text: 34-36 B-C bra nomal wear. I bought a M size. The size itself is okay. The material feels soft and comfortable on my skin. But, showing Nipples shape is NOT okay. You must wear a tank or something to hide your girls. Some people in the reviews say it does not show. That was why I decided to purchase these. Very disappointing ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Joelle

customer_reviews.title: Gives no support.
customer_reviews.text: For such a simple design, I expected this bra to fit with no issues. I was wrong. While the material is very soft, it gives almost no support. If you want to use it as a "sleeping bra" or "training bra", it is perfect. However, if you need even the slightest amount of support, this is not the bra for you. Also came frayed in multiple areas and was unraveling on the main seams. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: James Pohlman

customer_reviews.title: Poorly constructed.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this a month ago and I have only worn it maybe five times. I have washed it according to the directions yet it is already coming apart at the seams. I am very disappointed as I have been wearing my other Champion sports bras for years with no issues at all. And as luck would have it today was the final return date. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: K. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Too small for me and has a discolored neckline
customer_reviews.text: This bra was too small, if I ordered again I'd size up. I'm a 38C, so both Large and X-Large were options - I should have gone for XL. The bra's neckline also came with a weird greenish-yellow discoloration along the neckline. It's a bit hard to see in the picture, and at first I thought maybe the tag bled onto it since the green on the tag is a close match, but I noticed the discoloration along the back of the neck as well. Perhaps it would come out when washed, but I'll never know since I'm returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Reid

customer_reviews.title: Most Comfortable Sports Bra I Own
customer_reviews.text: This is the best sports bra I have ever worn! I have several, which I have purchased from numerous stores and sites. Most are stiff and the fit is either too loose or too tight. The material of this sports bra is super stretchy and soft. I was a bit disappointed that it wasn't lined with cups because I am very small chested and like the added padding. But the comfort of this sports bra makes it all worth it. I can't emphasize enough how much I love this sports bra. It is also very flattering.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Wood

customer_reviews.title: I don't usually like sports bras without cups built in
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually like sports bras without cups built in, but this one is great. It's definitely not for a super high impact workout, but if you know that going in it definitely meets expectations. It fit exactly as I expected, and the color (I got the Mystic Purple) was true to the photo. This is a great deal for a high quality sports bra. The material is stretchy, movable, comfortable, and breathable - the straps haven't bothered my neck or shoulders despite being a classic racerback style. I'd definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a light impact (or a medium impact if your chest is on the smaller side) workout bra.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne

customer_reviews.title: The perfect sports bra
customer_reviews.text: I love this sports bra. It has just the right amount of support but is comfortable and flattering. My biggest compliment is that this bra is easy to get on and off. I am at 36B and wear a Large. It never rolls or gets twisted. I don't believe that Champion is making them anymore so I have been gobbling them up. I wear my workout clothes all day (while working at home during Covid) and then run upstairs at the end of the day to workout. I have been paying 35 to 40 dollars wherever I can find them so this price is really great.
customer_reviews.author: Robin C8

customer_reviews.title: Pure comfort in a sports bra
customer_reviews.text: I had bought a Champion sports bra years ago and it became my go to bra for workouts, working from home, and just lounging around the house on weekends. I had not been able to find a comparable sports bra until I saw this on Amazon at such a fair price. It is exactly as described and fits as expected. I especially like how stretchy and comfortable it is, although I could see that the support may not be as sufficient for intense cardio workouts (hence the 4 stars versus 5 stars). Overall, I highly recommend based on comfort alone!
customer_reviews.author: DR

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable! Wish I'd bought this earlier.
customer_reviews.text: A million years ago I picked up a handful of champion seamless sports bras when they were featured at Costco. They have become far too small, but I haven't been able to find anything in a store that competed with the quality so I just put up with having bras that were too small. I finally got fed up and turned to Amazon. SO GLAD I DID!!! Within minutes of first putting it on, I was literally putting 5 more in my cart. This is a great, basic sports bra. The multiple textures of the fabric provide a little bit of support and shaping, but otherwise these are just plain comfortable and breathable.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Miley

customer_reviews.title: Favorite sports bra of all time
customer_reviews.text: I love & live in this style of champion sports bras. I used to buy them at Target, but they have changed the style, adding removable padding, which I can't stand. Why does one need extra padding in a sports bra? I also have a shoulder injury, which prevents me from being able to put on & take off certain non-clasped bras. These have great stretch to them, making it super easy to pull over my shoulder. The material is soft & comfortable & washes well in the gentle cycle & line dried.
customer_reviews.author: Laura LeBorgne

customer_reviews.title: Unimpressed, Elastic Rolls Up With Use
customer_reviews.text: I carefully took my measurements before ordering, but the fit of this bra is just odd. The elastic under the bust rolls up with minimal movement (I haven't even tried to wear it to the gym yet). This bra was highly rated so I'm disappointed, but not as badly had it cost more. I am giving it the Stars I have because the seams are unobtrusive, the material is comfortable, and it was not as expensive as many sports bras that are less comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Griffin

customer_reviews.title: So toxic I've never worn it....
customer_reviews.text: I bought this two years ago, along with another half dozen or so jog bras. It strongly smelled of chemicals, so I've spent some part of the past two years: 1) washing in multiple times; 2) soaking it in activated charcoal/baking soda/vinegar; 3) leaving it sitting outside my high altitude house in the sunshine. The bad news: it still smells so strongly of chemicals that I'm not willing to wear it, nor am I willing to give it away to the Thrift Store. It will go in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: madamX

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This style of Champion sports bra I've used successfully many years and I'm glad I purchased it again. Fits me well in a Medium. At the same time, I also ordered the more supportive Absolute Working Sports Bra, also in Medium, and I sent it back because it was much too tight, more like a Small. I l love this sports bra even though it's supposed to be less supportive. I'm a 36C and prefer the natural and not as restrictive a feel that other sports bras have. This sports bra offers enough support for me.
customer_reviews.author: EMK

customer_reviews.title: No support, too stretchy.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was the same one I used to get from Target. I followed the size chart in ordering—for 32DD a small, and was also my same size from the old ones. Arrived and was NOT the same level of support at all, and very stretchy. Not at all supportive. Even doing yoga, I felt everything moving around too much. Additionally, on first washing it picked up all kinds of lint in the dryer and pilled up terribly. Would not order again.
customer_reviews.author: Sujana

customer_reviews.title: Not the active support advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Any one with more than an A cup size should consider this minimal support. The only way it might be useful to me would be too purchase it so small that it worked as kind of a breast binder. I have 3 old, old Avia bras I am trying to replace, and this was listed as a bra with a lot of support. I'm better off with my 4 year old Avia's. I am sending it back. The material looks pretty durable, but gives little support. I can pull the straps up above my ears from my shoulders. I am 5'5'' tall and weight 160 lbs. I normally wear a 36DD bra.
customer_reviews.author: olmamma

customer_reviews.title: So soft!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 49 yo, 145lb and wear a 36B bra. I ordered a size L since I don't like them extremely tight around my rib cage. I wear them for the comfort under my tshirts and tanks, not for any high impact activities. I do have to wear shields (thin pads) under them because of the nature of the material and the fact they have no lining. I don't like for the girls to be on high beams. :P Fits as expected and very soft!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff's Copilot

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Was a little scared buying something like this online but this is super comfortable and I'm glad I got it, I do a lot of HIIT workouts and I am sensitive in the chest area so jumping around sucks if I don't have something with a lot of compression. I'm tall and not very top heavy, lost a lot of volume in my chest from having a child and losing a lot of weight, will probably be buying a few more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Threadgill

customer_reviews.title: This is the MOST comfortable sports bra
customer_reviews.text: This is the MOST comfortable sports bra. Love it. Supportive, no pads, stretchy, soft, need I say more. 36 B - bought a Medium, fits great. I would say that if you are short in body length the straps might be too long. I am 5'8' and they could be a tad shorter. Still have not found anything that fits better than this sports bra.
customer_reviews.author: Woosie

customer_reviews.title: Works for 34C
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 34C, and I'm happy with the medium. The girls still have a little movement, but I wear the bra for walking and rather than wear it alone, it's always under a shirt. Could probably wear the small, but I don't need more compression. Also have to remember that you have to get it on and off--don't think I could wrestle in and out of a small. If you're larger than a C cup or want something for higher impact sports like jogging, this may not work for you. For me the medium is comfortable and gives enough control.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Minimal support, low neckline
customer_reviews.text: Got this hoping to replace some old Champion sports bras that are 7+ years old and no longer available. This bra is alright, but it's pretty minimal support. I'm a bad runner, so I don't run fast enough for it to really bother me, but I would not classify this as a running bra at all. It also has a pretty low scooped neck compared to the picture. I prefer fuller coverage.
customer_reviews.author: BL

customer_reviews.title: ex lg fits 36DDD...fyi since the sizing chart wont tell you!
customer_reviews.text: purchased one of these last year & liked it, so came back for another this year, now there is always a clean white one in the drawer to throw on under a white tshirt...comfortable & supportive enough to wear around the house or out hiking/walking...don't think I would run in it but lets face it, I haven't run since high school...when u hit the DDD, it just is not a comfortable thing to do...ever! they should put on the sizing chart that if you are 36DDD the extra large will fit fine, don't know why the sizing chart only goes to one D...but now you know!
customer_reviews.author: queenme

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend, Repeat Customer of Champion
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because it was the closest in style/material to an older sports bra by Champion that I have been looking to replace. After trying upwards of 8 other sports bras by different manufacturers, I'm happy that I chose to go this route. This sports bra is very comfortable, durable, and reliable. I'm purchasing another one today and would highly recommend others try for themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Flop City
customer_reviews.text: I got a 38C and expected to at least while walking not "To bounce up and down" which sadly I did. I was expecting as a Sports Bra and having used Champion products in the past I could perhaps do some mild exercise (other than the walking" without feeling as tho not wearing a bra at all flopping away. The cup size was fine. Instead of returning I gave to my housemate which in turn fit her perfectly as a sports bra. She wears the same size just not the cup size. Extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Teresa M

customer_reviews.title: Nipples are see through!
customer_reviews.text: The pictures look nice, but the material is thin, there's no padding so your nipples are clearly visible. God forbid if it gets wet.
customer_reviews.author: Ting Z.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for small bands and large busts
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable sports bra ever! Suitable for small bands and large busts. A large fit me perfect as a 32DDD and provided excellent coverage. My underbust is 31". Probably won't be great for a high impact workout but I mainly intend to use it to sleep in anyways. It is so difficult to find sports bras that come down far enough in the band to accommodate my size and still be snug around the ribs. I've ordered 2 more.
customer_reviews.author: OhSoChewey

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, though tight on me, very  supportive
customer_reviews.text: This sports bra is definitely supportive! It is incredibly tight on me! I bought the size that was recommended so maybe it’s supposed to fit that way. I literally had to have my husband help me pull it off it was so tight. But I’m worried if I bought a looser one it wouldn’t be supportive enough so I’m keeping it. It’s comfortable when on, it’s just really tight on me.
customer_reviews.author: LHB

customer_reviews.title: So Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect bra for Covid 19. I'm too large breasted to go without wearing something all day. But now that I am not dressing up to go out to events and such, there's no reason to wear an uncomfortable, underwire bra that digs into my chest and side all day. This bra gives support but ease of motion. Wish they had more colors.
customer_reviews.author: L. Stern

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I don't like that if I choose to not wear a t-shirt my nipples show. I kept it... but cant use it for what I intended. Ordered a different brand that works better. I wear medium shirts, size 10, 34D sometimes 34DD I was on the fence whether I should get a medium or large. Ordered Medium. Fits great very comfortable but would never exercise in it.
customer_reviews.author: D&K Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great colors, Poor sizing and it "peels"
customer_reviews.text: I purchased three in different colors. According to the size chart I need an XL. Not! They are all too big. I did buy the same sports bra at a Kohls store in a size L (large). Perfect fit. Another thing I hate about this bra is I washed them all before wearing them (I have sensitive skin), and The bras "peeled" like cheap polyester sweaters peel. Never had that happen with a sports bra. Therefore once the peeling happens you cannot wear the bra alone or out. It must be worn under something or it looks cheap and cheesy.
customer_reviews.author: just a girl

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bra! Must have ten of them that seem to survive with gentle washing and line drying. Super comfortable. Provides support when I’m on the mat (active yogi here!), and looks great under t-shirts when I’m going about my day. I’m a slender build (5’ 7” - 112lb), 34C and wear a medium. Fits perfectly. Nice support, not too snug.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly T.

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase, Buying More!
customer_reviews.text: This bra is absolutely great! I wear it to work as a postal carrier and need something that’s supportive for running to doors as well as comfortable enough to wear upwards of 8 hours a day. This is that bra! It fits great, I got a small as a 36C lady and that was perfect. It’s not so tight that it digs in or leaves marks at the end of the day, but it’s still supportive enough that I don’t feel the need to cradle myself when I’m running around. If you’re looking for a good sports bra that’s not fancy, or sexy, this is it!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Dunn

customer_reviews.title: The material and the overall construction feel comfortable. Though fit
customer_reviews.text: The material and the overall construction feel comfortable. Though fit, I would say it is low impact and wonder if lady with bigger breast might find it supportive enough for more vigorous exercise. Another problem is when I wore it with my AK Ultimate Direction hydration vest for a 32km trail run last weekend, the bra chafed against my neck when one of my water bottle was full and the other empty. It has never happened with my other sports bras even though the water bottles are not balanced! Last week, I had to keep the volume of both water bottles well balanced to stop the pain. I think the seamless design doesn't work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Fung

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This sports bra was just what I was looking for. I always loved my old Champion N9500 sports bras, but it has become harder and harder to find them in-stores. (Target only seems to carry the kind with padded inserts these days.) This sports bra is super basic and a perfect replacement for the old N9500 style. No padding. No inserts. Just thick stretchy fabric that offers plenty of support and privacy. I run in mine all the time. I'm a 32C and I ordered a size S. Fits perfectly: nice and snug/supportive for heavy workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Sizing seems tricky
customer_reviews.text: I really like it, just not the price. Very comfortable but stretched out after only 2 washes and I dry them in a dryer. If I remember correctly I sized up because of the reviews but I wish I had just got my normal size. It may have been tight at first but it would have stretched out to the perfect size soon after.
customer_reviews.author: -H

customer_reviews.title: No support at all
customer_reviews.text: This bra provided NO support at all and it was close to not wearing a bra at all. I received better support from a bathing suit top. The material was very flimsy and thin. The sizing chart was wrong as well. It said should have ordered a large but I would have been better off with a medium. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I love the Champion seamless sports bras. I wear them every day for work as a bathing suit top (I scuba dive for work). They are very comfortable after a long day with no sores from pressure points. They work well on a boat and offer good support. They dry quickly and leave you feeling clean after they dry. I would highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla N.

customer_reviews.title: Finally!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a great, comfortable lounge bra for years. I had some from many years ago by JogBra, but I can no longer find them. These are great! This bra is supportive, but comfortable. And, the band doesn't roll up much. It does roll up some, but much less than similar styled bras. I am a 38DD and so a comfortable, supportive bra with a band that doesn't roll up is a rare find. I don't use it for working out though. Definitely not enough support for that.
customer_reviews.author: Desperate Housewife

customer_reviews.title: Good Bra, Bad Packaging
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived with a hole through the outer packaging and inner packaging with a dirty area on the band. I think it will be able to wash off, but I'm not impressed with the shipping packaging. Came with a broken plastic coat hanger as well. The product itself is good. Just watch out for the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The product is great, but the sizing is terrible
customer_reviews.text: The product is great, but the sizing is terrible. This would fit a skinny teenager, not an adult woman. I have had this same brand in the past, but what happened to the sizing? It is totally wrong. I laid the bra down flat and the measurement across the bottom was 13". That makes a total of around 26" in circumference. Who is that small as an XL?
customer_reviews.author: MYL

customer_reviews.title: I tried it on and it fits me perfect. Overall for this product
customer_reviews.text: I just received this sports bra. the shipment is very fast, thanks for Amazon Prime program. But I was supersized the size is very small. According to their size chart, I should order Medium size. But the real bra was very small and it was very hard for me to put on. I need to return this back. Strangely, there is another sports bra I ordered the same time with this one. My order for that was Medium too. But it comes with a size of XL. Well, I tried it on and it fits me perfect. Overall for this product, I learnt that their size is not accurate, or completely messed up.
customer_reviews.author: FromJersey

customer_reviews.title: Low support and no padding
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this bra, I really did. It's super comfy and fits well BUT it has almost no support (definitely not an impact sports bra), there is zero padding and the material is really thin. So if you have prominent nipples, they will show right though. Sadly, I had to return.
customer_reviews.author: N. M. Fussing

customer_reviews.title: Pretty thin and ok for anything not bouncy!
customer_reviews.text: This sports bra like others said is pretty thin - like if it's cold, others will notice! HA! Comfortable to wear around and maybe so yoga or weights but you will bounce with no support. And if you tend to have the headlights show when you work out I would wear a baggy shirt!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: inconvenient!
customer_reviews.text: Although this is the right fit, the design of the thin foam insert is about as inconvenient as it can be! It should either be sewn in permanently or not be there at all. Every time you wash it, you have to re-position or replace them through the tiniest opening. It is infuriating and takes patience and time.......I mean really!!
customer_reviews.author: vsalt

customer_reviews.title: This is a great sports bra
customer_reviews.text: This champion sports bra is a secure hold for larger breasted women. Yes it is a uni boob bra but it is remarkably comfortable and moves with what ever sport yoga cycle you are working on. By far the most comfortable bra I have tried in....well many years of cycling.
customer_reviews.author: trek

customer_reviews.title: two now
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these some months ago, and it worked very well! No complaints. Comfortable. Works good for throwing on that workout outfit, and remains nice and comfortable if you were to wear it all day - which I have many times! So I decided to purchase a second one many months later (as of present). Once again, no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: WhitK

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I wear sports bras for daily wear as well as working out. I normally wear a size 36B bra, and the medium fits me perfectly. It's cool, comfortable, and provides sufficient support for most activities, including horse-riding. I'll definitely be ordering more of these.
customer_reviews.author: OK Cards Fan

customer_reviews.title: Too tight
customer_reviews.text: I have had Champion running bras in the past and decided it was time for a new one. I am a 34B, 5'4", 100 lbs. and got the small. However, it was was entirely too tight! Not sure if different colors run different size wise but I ordered the pink. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Hazel1

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Yoga
customer_reviews.text: This bra doesn't supply full support: I won't be running in it. But it does supply enough support for my Yoga classes, and enough coverage to make me comfortable. That is good enough for me. I have worn Champion sports bras for years, and have not been disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria H

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: At last! No stupid foam inserts or 'molded' cups, just decent support (even for larger sizes), real comfort, and a SUPER reasonable price! The racer back is also comfortable, and I've had problems with these before with them cutting off circulation in my shoulders and causing pain, but this bra is really well designed. There's a bit of "uniboob" going on, but practically all of them have that in the larger sizes. All in all, I am delighted!
customer_reviews.author: Morgaine Bergman

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace one of the same brand, style and size. The one I have fits well and is extremely comfortable. When the new one arrived, I was disappointed to find that it was not made the same. The bottom band is now a single piece of thin elastic that rolls up with any movement. The previous one has a sturdy 2 inch elastic band covered in fabric which stays in place and supports well. Why the change? It was not an improvement. I suspect it comes down to profit margin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying sports bras at every fancy high end athletic and lingerie store on earth. They all sucked. This one is PEEFECT. I’m a small C with some migrated breast tissue under one arm. This covers perfectly and is super soft and comfortable. Not recommended for larger chests as it doesn’t offer much support for high impact sports, but ideal for smaller women.
customer_reviews.author: V. Bates

customer_reviews.title: Good support, VERY soft bras!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bra!! It fits perfectly, due to the criss cross hooks, it provides wonderful support to this lady in her late 60's. I highly recommend these for women, like myself who are seasoned with time and life experience but still have a lot of fire inside them!!
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Bosoms secured, sergeant!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this is snug. Your boobs will feel very, very well-contained, arguably as if they are standing at attention, or functioning as part of a ballistics vest. At 30E, I have skinny ribs and actual cleavage, and boy, is running up and down the stairs suddenly a non-issue. Occasionally I feel as if the blood flow to everything below my breastbone is being impeded, and if I sleep in it I wake up with a backache. So don't do that.
customer_reviews.author: CatBuzzard

customer_reviews.title: Flat chest with shallow boobs? This works ok.
customer_reviews.text: I have a very flat chest (breasts are set shallow, don't fold over the ribcage) and I was looking for a sports bra with more compression support against the front of the breast rather than around the bottom band. This works okay. I'll have to layer up with a second bra for high intensity workouts, but they hold in place fairly well for moderate workouts and don't brush my big ribcage.
customer_reviews.author: Saturniidae

customer_reviews.title: Great bra for old ladies as well and hard exercizing.
customer_reviews.text: I don't really need a sports bra since I no longer do strenuous workouts or running, but I find them very comfortable for normal wear and for the mild exercising I do now . The ones I use to wear suddenly took a sharp turn where quality was concerned, so I tried a couple before coming to this one. It's a little hard to put on, but once it's on I barely know it's there. The only reason for 4 stars instead of 5 is the short time I've had them. It deserves a 5 if they last as long as I think they should.
customer_reviews.author: mistwing mom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Use it every day! Being a Beachbody coach... this has been my best friend. Holds the gals in well even for this larger chested lady. Never holds any kind of smell from working out and never left any uncomfortable rub marks like I have with others.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Jorges

customer_reviews.title: Not really supportive
customer_reviews.text: It's obscenely comfortable, but provides basically zero support. Three stars for these reasons, but I expected it to be more supportive and use it for exercise but it will instead be used for sleeping. Buying a smaller size wouldn't help because it's so stretchy.
customer_reviews.author: DameEdna

customer_reviews.title: Not for running
customer_reviews.text: Although soft and comfy, they give poor support. Would work for gentle exercise like yoga, but no suitable for aerobic activities.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: I hate this product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product to workout at home thinking it would have good support for moderate exercises. It had really soft material which did not help much with the bouncing, i got really hot in the bra without even working out. I requested return for this product and had to pay $12.45 for the return which was the cheapest option and was definitely not worth it. I am furious cuz this was a complete waste of money regardless. So please do not order this unless you are sure that you'd be cool with the product or are cool with paying that much money for the return.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona Mendonca

customer_reviews.title: My go to brand for sports bras!
customer_reviews.text: I had a champion sports bra just like this one for a long time before loosing track of it recently. It was a size medium, but wasn't too tight on me. I ordered a medium again and this one is a lot tighter. I wonder if the impact was different? Nevertheless, it's still a great brand and I'll probably order a different size/impact for the future :)
customer_reviews.author: E. Rust

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Sports Bra
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the quality of this sports bra. It stays put but is not tight. It is well made and washes well. It has gone through the dryer fine even though I did that by accident. It is comfortable and stretchy and I forget I have it on. I will buy several more. I think the price is definitely good for what it is. Pleasantly surprised at the quality.
customer_reviews.author: KD from Missouri

customer_reviews.title: No padding and shoes right through material!
customer_reviews.text: I will be returning this bra as I should have paid more attention to the reviews. The material claims to be thick but not in the chest area where your nipples show right through even when your not cold. I wouldn’t recommend this bra just for that alone because u wouldn’t be able to leave the house!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good low impact sports bra
customer_reviews.text: It's just slightly too big, but it's ok because I bought it to wear after recovering from surgery and as an alternative to a bra rather than working out. I would categorize this more as a low impact sports bra. I am a 32C and ordered a medium. Would I order this sports bra again? Ultimately, yes. It's comfortable, I like the colors, and works for what I need. I would not use it for high impact work outs though.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Burkhardt

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable sports bra!  However order one size up  as this runs small.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sports bra. It does run in the small side so I recommend that you go one size larger. I ordered a large and extra-large and the extra-large was more comfortable. It has medium support and still good for working out. I wish they also offered a lining however. I will definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Heather M

customer_reviews.title: I don't wear it for any hard running but it works well for walking or hiking.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this sports bra. It doesn't have any padding and hard nipples will show through the material. I don't wear it for any hard running but it works well for walking or hiking. I did not some of the orange thread border did fall off but it wasn't much and not a big deal to me. I would say its mostly worth the buy if you know what you're buying
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Easy to Get On and Off
customer_reviews.text: I ordered several different sports bras from Amazon and liked this one the best. It's very comfortable and easy to get off and on. Some of the others were extremely tight and thick; this made them hard to get into and hard to get off. I don't have large breasts - if you're a DD or something you might need one that is stiffer. I don't normally wear sports bras but needed one for a treadmill test and was pleasantly surprised at how much I liked it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable sports bra for medium- and low-impact sports
customer_reviews.text: This sports bra has a good design and is comfortable for medium-impact and low-impact sports. It breathes fairly well and gives a bit of shape, rather than flattening the chest. It comes in several colors. It is good for everyday wear, too.
customer_reviews.author: iconoclast

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: This sports bra is very comfy for wearing around the house but It’s not med. support. I wouldn’t do a cardio workout in it. I bought the medium and I typically wear a 34d in vs bras. It’s very stretchy I probably could of got a small for a tighter fit. Overall it’s comfortable but for me not ideal for workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I had an ancient champion bra that I realized was my go to, so I looked for another that seemed to be the same stretchy material. I am average build and just need moderate support, so I hate the feeling of compression bras. This one was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: li

customer_reviews.title: If you want a comfortable fit with support consider ordering one size larger.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a medium using the size chart and reading the reviews of the fit. It seemed snug but I expected it to be. I went for a 30 minute walk on a hot sunny day. When I returned to change clothes it was very difficult for me to take off. I am 66 years old and was very sweaty. I am going to try the large because it is the style that seemed best for walking and cycling. It is well made.
customer_reviews.author: Debby G

customer_reviews.title: Zero support, useless
customer_reviews.text: This sports bra is a total joke. Absolute zero support just walking. The girls were moving around like water balloons. Might as well not wear anything.
customer_reviews.author: st0rm

customer_reviews.title: So Comfy
customer_reviews.text: OK this is not a high impact sports bra, especially if you have DDs like I do. If you're going to be running, jumping, or bouncing then you'll give yourself a black eye. However this is an extremely comfortable bra that I like to wear around the house or to work. It wicks sweat so if I'm doing any heavy lifting or its 100+ Fahrenheit I'm not stuck in a soaking bra. I wear a 32 DD and the small was great. It's a very stretchy material.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: It feels good! It’s supportive when I exercise but is not ...
customer_reviews.text: It feels good! It’s supportive when I exercise but is not a “binder” like my great aunts wore in the 20’s. I ordered one several months ago and liked it so much I recently ordered 2 more. Also, it holds up well in the wash. Finally, it wicks away perspiration and allows air to flow, so it’s not too hot. This bra will work well all summer, I think.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Stretchy, soft - no cups
customer_reviews.text: Very stretchy! But the material is super soft and made these an instant favorite. Do not put these through the dryer, they will not hold up - properly, they should be hung to dry. I didn't think they had much support, plus the stretchy meant I was trying to size down on these. But again, soft and wonderful wicking material for exercise or other active needs. No cups though, so be aware that if you're cold then others will know it.
customer_reviews.author: Benji

customer_reviews.title: Not for heavy breasted girls.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I wanted to give up under wire bras. It holds them up kinda. Not a compression bra and not for heavy breasted girls. Great for around the house. Also stretches with time. I’m constantly pulling and tugging at this bra. I gave it five stars cause I don’t think its fair to judge this regular bra based my huge demands!! 😜
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: In Place!
customer_reviews.text: Had serveral others made by the same company. They fit great and give me support that i needed. They are very comfortable to wear that is why i like them so much. They are well made, they last and they are comfortable...
customer_reviews.author: Dana Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Good Low Impact Sports Bra
customer_reviews.text: I followed the sizing guide, and the fit is perfect - Medium for a 36B. The fabric and fit is comfortable. I don't know that I'd wear it for more than a slow jog, but it's perfect for my Tai Chi class or for walking. Minimal padding in the cups, which makes it more breathable in the summer. That's important to me, being in Texas. I got the white, and it's definitely an undergarment - not to be worn by itself. I've had sports bras in the past which stick to sweaty skin enough to almost dislocate a shoulder when you pry them off - I have not had that problem with this bra. I'll probably order a second!
customer_reviews.author: J. Vilches

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable but fabric is somewhat thin
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable sports bra and the color (I got the flight blue) is just as bright as pictured!! I would have given 5 starts except the material is somewhat thin in the front and doesn't hide cold nipples. Other than that, it fits perfectly (5'5" 100lbs and I got size small) and the stretchy, soft material is so comfortable it feels like you're not wearing anything!
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, supportive, made well.
customer_reviews.text: This is hands-down my favorite sports bra. It is super supportive without being restricting. It has held up well in the wash for hundreds of cycles. It’s clear that these are made well, as I haven’t had any loose stitching.
customer_reviews.author: Peachy Kween

customer_reviews.title: Great for minimum support only.
customer_reviews.text: I like this bra but it is definitely a minimum support bra. It is the type of bra I will wear around the house, for errands, etc. I would absolutely NOT wear this for any type of working out or sports because it isn't definitely not supportive enough for that. There are no under wires or extra padding, but it is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon B.

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Most of the sports bras fit way too tight and press into my shoulders. I got an XL for 38 inch and it fits perfect and the shoulders are not too tight. This is similar to the Champion sports bras that Target used to have. But the size varies and the white runs smaller than the pinksicle and I had to return the white. Nice for everyday. 2020: Pink Bow is more coral than pink.
customer_reviews.author: GraceAlone

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I first got this type of sports bra about 8 years ago in the store. I was heartbroken when I couldn’t find anymore like it afterwards. I’m glad I ordered it on here! It’s not exactly the same as the original, but it’s still a very comfortable and breathable fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Angelie Matar

customer_reviews.title: Possibly need a smaller size?
customer_reviews.text: I had to send this product back because it didn't have the support I was hoping for. It says "Medium Support" so I figured this would be good for most things other than running and jumping. I tried it on and did the "hop test" and was seriously disappointed. I'm giving the bra three stars because it did feel comfortable and seemed to be made fairly well. Maybe I could try a small and that would work better. I bought a medium and it felt snug but not tight, and I am a 36.
customer_reviews.author: Aly W.

customer_reviews.title: Wayyy too tight.
customer_reviews.text: Did that thing where my neck hurt because of the way it was pinching in the back. Had it on for a couple of hours and when I took it off there were huge indents where the elastic was. I have the same size in other brands that do not do this - would not recommend for anyone bigger than a 32
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best fitting sports bra for large chest
customer_reviews.text: This is BY FAR my favorite sports bra I have ever owned. I want to wear it all the time. I will say it isn't the MOST supportive, but if you're like me and feel like the super supportive sports bras are way too restrictive, this is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Wolff

customer_reviews.title: Great Sports Bra
customer_reviews.text: I need a sports bra with support and padding....I found this one online and It had everything I needed. Perfect fit! Great customer support when I had a question and they handled it so efficiently and with great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Wiltshire

customer_reviews.title: Great Sports Bra
customer_reviews.text: I really like this sports bra. It fits a little bit larger than I thought it would so it isn't ideal if you are going to be doing a lot of cardio or jumping up and down. If you are planning on doing lower impact workouts then go ahead and buy your regular size, but if you would like it to fit a little tighter to hold the girls in place I would go down a size. The fabric is super soft and the bra is comfortable to wear. Overall a good purchase, I am planning on buying it in other colors as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kailey

customer_reviews.title: Sports Bra
customer_reviews.text: It is very comfortable. The material does not stay damp and wet like cotton does. The first one fit great, so I just ordered 2 more. Provides good support for golfing, but it probably would not for someone jogging who has a cup size larger than a C. You may want to go to a more supportive model. I read some complaints about a "uni-boob" look before I purchased it, but really, who cares if you are comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: DJB in Baton Rouge, LA

customer_reviews.title: No support, great for low impact
customer_reviews.text: I will probably just use this bra on days I do yoga or weight, has NO support. I'm a 38D and bought a large and it was hardly even snug. Made the mistake of going to a high intensity work out class without trying it first, I've never had the girls bounce so much, it was actually painful. I give it three stars because it was comfy, and maybe with a smaller size I would have had more support, and I can use it for low impact stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Breastfeeding/Maternity
customer_reviews.text: Don’t order a size up if your pregnant or breastfeeding. They stretch tremendously & fit accordingly. I’m naturally a 34DDD but I’m breastfeeding & bigger so I ordered a size up. It fit too large so I had to reorder medium. & THEY’RE PERFECT FOR NURSING.
customer_reviews.author: Cloe Doctor Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great wicking bra
customer_reviews.text: Great wicking bra; comfortable for days off. I'm a DD and this is supportive enough for yoga and comfortable enough for wearing all day, but not for higher-impact activity (not even the elliptical). And not that this matters to me, but they don't give any shape, so if that's important to you I'd recommend bras with molded cups.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Low support
customer_reviews.text: This is low to moderate impact. You can wear it around the house or to go for a walk, but that's about it. It's even loose enough to use as a nursing bra. If you are looking for a sports bra for exercise, keep looking!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Sports Bra
customer_reviews.text: Love this sports bra, I do not use it for working out because I need something more supportive but I love wearing after a long day in my underwire bra. Very comfortable, and supportive for casual wear.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: comfy for jogging
customer_reviews.text: I am only a C cup but this kept me very comfortable while jogging. My only complaint is that my nipples were super visible, so I could not wear this without a shirt over it. If you have big nipples and care about people seeing them, you won't be able to wear this bra without a shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sports bra
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sports bra...I have 4 different styles and this one is by far the best fitting and most comfortable even on hot sticky days. (I just ordered a second one). It’s not bulky and material is ideal for all my exercise activities...biking, hiking and walking. I’m a rather small framed person so not sure how this bra would be for a larger person. Regardless, it’s perfect for me!
customer_reviews.author: Gerhard

customer_reviews.title: My favorite sports bra!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite sports bras. I used to buy them at Target but they are getting harder to find. They don't give a ton of support for running, so I wear two at the same time and it's perfect. I'm 32DD but hate the bras that are made specifically for runners with larger busts. These are easy to wash and I dry them in the dryer with other running clothes.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kim

customer_reviews.title: I will buy this over and over
customer_reviews.text: The best sports bra I’ve found. It’s really comfortable and supportive. It’s my favorite and I’ve bought at least 2 more since (in fact it think I’ll get another now that I think of it). :)
customer_reviews.author: Patsy D.

product_meta.title: Champion Women's Freedom Seamless Racerback Sport Bra
product_meta.description: The seam-free freedom racerback bra by Champion provides comfort and ease of movement.
feature_bullets: Moisture Management technology and knit in ventilating mesh help keep you cool and dry
Knit-in inner bra and wide bottom band provide additional support
Two-ply fabric stretches for freedom of movement.
Champion Vapor technology wicks sweat and dries quickly for cooler comfort.
Seamless design to minimize chafing and 4-way stretch to maximize comfort
